author: James Martin
method: Preheat grill to highest setting. Heat a saucepan of water until boiling and then par-boil the diced potato for 4-5 minutes. Drain and stir through wholegrain mustard and rosemary with a fork. Place a ring mould on a baking sheet and fill with the potato mixture, pressing down. Top with crumbled Stilton cheese and place under the grill for 2-3 minutes, until bubbly. Serve.
ingredients: 170g/6oz new potatoes, diced,  1 tsp wholegrain mustard,  1 tbsp rosemary, blended in mini food processor,  25g/1oz Stilton cheese
